comments.author: Matt
comments.body: What more than a bionic toe do I need to beat Dave? My iPod and some appropriate tunes. Oh, and my stock, un-scoped knees. Enjoy your ride!

comments.author: Katie
comments.body: Steve-O, Adriana, Dave, and Greg-- THANK YOU for sharing some of your favorite lunchtime escape routes with me! Matt, shaving ounces is good. Katie
